# Question 1 Patent Dominance

| **Rank** | **Organization**                            | **Number of Patents** |
|------|-----------------------------------------|------------------:|
| 1    | International Business Machines Corporation | 7547             |
| 2    | Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.              | 5835             |

| 5    | Microsoft Corporation                      | 3165             |
| 6    | Google Inc.                                | 2668             |
